summary: This command uses ffmpeg to remove the black background from "bilibili.png" and save the result as "bilibili_transparent.png". The colorkey filter is applied with settings for black color, thresholding, and tolerance.

details.comment: This command uses ffmpeg to remove the black background from "bilibili.png" and save the result as "bilibili_transparent.png". The colorkey filter is applied with settings for black color, thresholding, and tolerance.
